org.embulk.jruby

Class ScriptingContainerDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.embulk.jruby.ScriptingContainerDelegate

  • public final class ScriptingContainerDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
    ScriptingContainerDelegate is an indirection layer onto JRuby not to require JRuby classes directly. It calls methods of ScriptingContainer through reflection. This trick enables Embulk:
    • To load a JRuby runtime (jruby-complete-*.jar) specified at runtime out of embulk-*.jar.
    • To switch versions of JRuby without releasing or repackaging.
    • To distribute Embulk without JRuby runtimes embedded.
